Pre-Game Insights: The USA-India Group A clash is highly anticipated as both teams have returned 100%-win records in their first two group games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium on Wednesday, June 12, 2024, and begins at 10.30am Eastern Standard Time.
Others: The new block of tickets are for general admission and are priced at $350 per ticket.
